abstract: Brooklyn Community Services, one of seven agencies supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, uses money to buy shirts for bowling team, part of recreation program for developmentally challenged adults.
lead_paragraph: Brooklyn Community Services’ recreation program gives adults with developmental delays opportunities to foster community, companionship and independence.
snippet: Brooklyn Community Services’ recreation program gives adults with developmental delays opportunities to foster community, companionship and independence.

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

headline.main: At Brooklyn Bowling Alley, Finding an Impetus for Autonomy
headline.print_headline: At Brooklyn Bowling Alley, League’s Members Find Incentive for Autonomy
